idea: Swap Fashions was founded in 2020 to solve the problem of excessive consumption created due to fast fashion and to reduce the carbon footprints of the fashion industry. Swap Fashions’ sole aim is to help women de-clutter and update their closets while not discarding the clothes into a dump. We encourage and facilitate swapping of preloved clothes via our platform. Women can also thrift preloved clothing from Swap Fashions in case they do not have clothes to trade-in for swapping. At Swap Fashions, we aim to get every urban person (in the middle/upper-middle-income group) to have at least one swapped/ thrifted outfit in their closet by the end of 2025.
name: Swap Fashions

idea:
Good Governance and why it matters


Desirous of building the long-term sustainability of business and driven by the demands of their stakeholders, progressive organisations are transitioning to a new normal and moving beyond mere compliance to elevating their governance models to encompass environmental, social, equity, transparency, impact other broader governance parameters. We support organisations hasten their journey from Governance to ‘Good Governance’ by offering comprehensive advisory services focused on building a sustainable “Business-India”.


 About us


We believe that good governance goes beyond mere compliance and is the key to impactful and long-term growth for any organisation - large or small. We help Boards reimagine how they will be organised and how work will get done. We aim to work with organisational leadership to increase their governance effectiveness and translate their vision into meaningful metrics across the organisation.

We are an ecosystem of consultants, practitioners and partner companies from diverse fields such as corporate, government, social sector and start-ups, drawn together with a determination to significantly alter the way governance processes and practices are engineered in corporate India.

The GoodGovern Approach

Our approach is rooted in understanding the regulatory environment, governance processes, human behaviour, organisational culture, and industry context. This is further enhanced by academic research rigour and the collective experience of many leaders in our advisory board. We bring these elements together to set a realistic baseline and arrive at a clear understanding of where an organisation lies on the governance curve and where it wishes to be.

We work with the Board and company leadership to leverage existing frameworks and build out new capabilities, goal setting and metrics to future proof the organisation's execution flexibility and strategic agility so that the journey towards good governance continues steadily and visibly.

Our 4 Pillar framework spans four aspects of the organisation to co-create and implement a governance framework that is process-oriented, practical and achievable.

 A. Purpose and Goals:

 B. People and Culture:

C. Process and Risk Oversight:

D. Performance and measurement:



OUR SOLUTIONS

GoodGovern offers a suite of solutions that can be implemented individually or as part of a larger governance framework. Their dynamic nature makes these solutions suited to a range of organisations, from those just embarking on their corporate governance, ESG or CSR journey to those that have led the way in these areas but are keen to reimagine impact.
name: GoodGovern Advisory services Pvt Ltd

idea:
www.blamblack.com

About Us

In Feburary 2020, BlamBlack opened its doors in Phoenix Paragon Plaza in Kurla and became home for Mumbai's fashionistas.

BlamBlack embodies downtown culture, and plays and integral part in it's constant regeneration, making fashion enthusiasts lured towards BlamBlack.

With its affordable range of apparels and accessories, BlamBlack established itself as a brand known for its Quality, Style and Authenticity.

Situated in the fashion capital of the country, the brand picked up immediately amongst youngsters for street style fashion


Our Mission & Vision

BlamBlack aims to be the World's Number One destination for fashion-loving enthusiasts.﻿

BlamBlacks' mission statement gives it a Concrete path to achieve what we want to achieve and also the motivation to be One of the Best.

We want people to express themselves, their choices, their styles, their looks completely with the help of BlamBlack. 'BlamBlack' will be their voice through which they will "Wear Their Image". We believe that everyone has their own fashion to express and that all of us should get the chance to put it out there to the world.

BlamBlack holds enormous motivation and dedication to face all the odds and be the Best throughout the world with excellent staff, knowledge, quality products, astonishing service
name: BlamBlack
